title: Panel, 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft (brocading)
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Dark red ground with central panel with crucifix. Four mihrab arches, two upper ones with mosque lamps and two lower ones with praying figures. Inscription band at top, geometric borders on four sides. Brocaded in gold and silver, with small amounts of green, blue, orange, red, and black.

participants.person_name: Estate of Mr. & Mrs. William H. Crocker

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 18th–19th century.Medium: silk, metal
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft (brocading). Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-12.
